Questing.desc: Chance to have an additional auto-hunt.

Crit Chance.desc: Increases your critical hit chance with a weapon. Critical weapon hits deal 150% damage.

Loot Chance Modifier.desc: Increases your chance to find loot. The modifier is multiplicative, not additive.

Attraction.desc: Increases your chance to encounter rarer non-boss enemies.

Summoning.desc: Increases your chance to encounter bosses. Hex of Summoning is required!

Cloning.desc: Chance that enemies count twice towards your mission progress.

Investment.desc: Increases your chance that your next won fight grants you +50% VGC.

XP-losion.desc: Increases your chance that the current fight grants you +50% XP if won.

Charge.desc: Deals one physical attack with your mount at the beginning of combat.

Healing Touch.desc: Chance to apply a healing-over-time (HOT) effect. HOTs restore health every round.

Lifeleech.desc: Chance to transfer health from your opponent to you.

Stun.desc: Chance to stun your opponent. Stunned opponents forfeit their next base weapon attack.

Evade.desc: Chance to evade an opponent's combat proc.

Theft.desc: Chance to steal VGC from your opponent.

Flying.desc: Chance to evade an opponent's base attack (= weapon attack).

First Strike.desc: Increases your chance to go first in combat.

Deathtouch.desc: Chance to remove retainer from combat.

Burn.desc: Chance to apply a fire damage-over-time (DOT) effect. DOTs deal damage every round.

Rot.desc: Chance to apply a poison damage-over-time (DOT) effect. DOTs deal damage every round.

Wound.desc: Chance to apply a physical damage-over-time (DOT) effect. DOTs deal damage every round.

Trauma.desc: Chance to apply a ballistic damage-over-time (DOT) effect. DOTs deal damage every round.

Frostbite.desc: Chance to apply an ice damage-over-time (DOT) effect. DOTs deal damage every round.

Shock.desc: Chance to apply an electric damage-over-time (DOT) effect. DOTs deal damage every round.

Fear.desc: Chance to apply a psychic damage-over-time (DOT) effect. DOTs deal damage every round.

Manaburn.desc: Chance to apply a mystic damage-over-time (DOT) effect. DOTs deal damage every round.

Firecurse.desc: Chance to curse your opponent to suffer more fire damage.

Slow.desc: Chance to curse your opponent to suffer more ballistic damage.

Weaken.desc: Chance to curse your opponent to suffer more physical damage.

Icecurse.desc: Chance to curse your opponent to suffer more ice damage.

Shadowcurse.desc: Chance to curse your opponent to suffer more shadow damage.

Stormcurse.desc: Chance to curse your opponent to suffer more electric damage.

Poisoncurse.desc: Chance to curse your opponent to suffer more poison damage.

Manacurse.desc: Chance to curse your opponent to suffer more mystic damage.

Xenobane.desc: Increases your damage against xeno enemies

Mystic Vulnerability.desc: Damage taken from mystic sources is increased.
